TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IRequestChannel implements class System.ServiceModel.Channels.IChannel, class System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject

summary.span: 定義通道必須實作的合約，這個合約會出現在傳訊端點之間要求–回覆通訊的要求端上。

span.span: Defines the contract that a channel must implement to be on the requesting side of a request-reply communication between messaging endpoints.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 會定義傳回回應訊息之 方法的同步和非同步 Variant。The defines synchronous and asynchronous variants of a method that returns a response message. 它也會提供 和 屬性來擷取要求訊息傳送的目標端點位址及 URI。It also provides a and properties to retrieve the endpoint address and URI to which the request message is sent.

summary.span: 開始非同步作業，以便將要求訊息傳輸至要求-回覆訊息交換的回覆端。

span.span: Begins an asynchronous operation to transmit a request message to the reply side of a request-reply message exchange.

span.span: The request to be transmitted.

param.name: callback
param.span: 委派 (Delegate)，這個委派會在非同步傳輸要求訊息作業完成時，收到通知。

span.span: The delegate that receives the notification of the completion of the asynchronous operation transmitting a request message.

param.name: state
param.span: 應用程式所指定的物件，其中包含與非同步傳輸要求訊息作業相關聯的狀態資訊。

span.span: An object, specified by the application, that contains state information associated with the asynchronous operation transmitting a request message.

summary.span: 開始非同步作業，以便將要求訊息傳輸至要求-回覆訊息交換的回覆端。

span.span: Begins an asynchronous operation to transmit a request message to the reply side of a request-reply message exchange.

returns.span: 參考非同步訊息傳輸的 。

span.span: The that references the asynchronous message transmission.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果要求訊息大於要使用之繫結所允許的訊息大小上限，則會擲回 。If the request message is larger that the maximum message size allowed by the binding being used, a is thrown. 訊息大小上限是由 屬性所設定。The maximum message size is set by the property. 預設值為 65536 個位元組。The default value is 65536 bytes. ## Examples 下列程式碼會示範如何實作這個方法。The following code shows how to implement this method. [!code-csharp[S_UE_HttpCookieSession#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_httpcookiesession/cs/httpcookierequestsessionchannel.cs#2)]

span.span: The request to be transmitted.

param.name: timeout
param.span: 指定必須收到回應之時間間隔的

span.span: The that specifies the interval of time within which a response must be received.

param.name: callback
param.span: 委派 (Delegate)，這個委派會在非同步傳輸要求訊息作業完成時，收到通知。

span.span: The delegate that receives the notification of the completion of the asynchronous operation transmitting a request message.

param.name: state

summary.span: 開始非同步作業，以便在指定的時間間隔內，將要求訊息傳輸至要求-回覆訊息交換的回覆端。

span.span: Begins an asynchronous operation to transmit a request message to the reply side of a request-reply message exchange within a specified interval of time.

returns.span: 參考非同步訊息傳輸的 。

span.span: The that references the asynchronous message transmission.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果要求訊息大於要使用之繫結所允許的訊息大小上限，則應該擲回 。If the request message is larger that the maximum message size allowed by the binding being used, a should be thrown. 訊息大小上限是由 屬性所設定。The maximum message size is set by the property. 預設值為 65536 個位元組。The default value is 65536 bytes. 如果在呼叫此函式時傳遞 `timeout`，則會使用該值。If a `timeout` is passed while calling the function then that value is used. 如果在繫結上設定 ，則如果在呼叫此函式時未指定任何 `timeout`，便會使用繫結上的值。If the is set on the binding, then the value on the binding is used if no `timeout` is specified while calling the function. 如果在繫結上或是呼叫此函式時，未指定任何逾時值，則會使用 。The is used if no timeout is specified on either the binding or while calling the function. 這個預設值為 1 分鐘。This default value is 1 minute. ## Examples 下列程式碼會示範如何實作這個方法：The following code shows how to implement this method: [!code-csharp[S_UE_HttpCookieSession#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_httpcookiesession/cs/httpcookierequestsessionchannel.cs#3)]

para.span: 如果在作業完成之前超出了指定的 ，此作業應該擲回 。

span.span: The operation should throw a if the specified is exceeded before the operation is completed.

summary.span: 取得要求通道傳送訊息的目標遠端位址。

span.span: Gets the remote address to which the request channel sends messages.

value.span: 要求通道傳送訊息的目標 。

span.span: The to which the request channel sends messages.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果沒有指定 ， 會同時當做最終目的端和實體位址。The serves as both the ultimate destination and the physical address if a is not specified. 如果指定了 ，這就是訊息傳送的實際實體目標位址，而且訊息必須透過這個位址，才能到達目的端。If the is specified, then that is the actual physical address to which the message is sent and through which the message must go to arrive at its destination. ## Examples 下列程式碼會示範如何實作這個屬性。The following code shows how to implement this property. [!code-csharp[S_UE_HttpCookieSession#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_httpcookiesession/cs/httpcookierequestsessionchannel.cs#0)]

summary.span: 傳送訊息型要求，並傳回相互關聯的訊息型回應。

span.span: Sends a message-based request and returns the correlated message-based response.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message Request (System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message message);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message Request(class System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message message) cil managed
public: System::ServiceModel::Channels::Message ^ Request(System::ServiceModel::Channels::Message ^ message);

span.span: The request to be transmitted.

summary.span: 傳送訊息型要求，並傳回相互關聯的訊息型回應。

span.span: Sends a message-based request and returns the correlated message-based response.
The received in response to the request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 的實作可確保回應訊息與要求訊息之間有相互關聯性。Implementations of ensure that the response message is correlated with the request message. 一般來說，當 的實作收到與未處理的要求不相關的訊息時，會將它捨棄。Generally, if an implementation of receives a message that is not correlated to an outstanding request, it is dropped. 方法可以在多個執行緒上同時呼叫。The method can be called concurrently across multiple threads. 將訊息傳遞給要求通道會造成該訊息遭到存取。Passing the message into the request channel causes the message to be accessed. 當您呼叫 之後，便無法再檢查此訊息，或針對此訊息呼叫 。After you call , you can no longer inspect the message or call on the message. 如果要求訊息大於要使用之繫結所允許的訊息大小上限，則會擲回 。If the request message is larger that the maximum message size allowed by the binding being used, a is thrown. 訊息大小上限是由 屬性所設定。The maximum message size is set by the property. 預設值為 65536 個位元組。The default value is 65536 bytes. ## Examples 下列程式碼會示範如何實作這個方法：The following code shows how to implement this method: [!code-csharp[S_UE_HttpCookieSession#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_httpcookiesession/cs/httpcookierequestsessionchannel.cs#5)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 的實作可確保回應訊息與要求訊息之間有相互關聯性。Implementations of ensure that the response message is correlated with the request message. 一般來說，當 的實作收到與未處理的要求不相關的訊息時，會將它捨棄。Generally, if an implementation of receives a message that is not correlated to an outstanding request, it is dropped. 方法可以在多個執行緒上同時呼叫。The method can be called concurrently across multiple threads. 將訊息傳遞給要求通道會造成該訊息遭到存取。Passing the message into the request channel causes the message to be accessed. 當您呼叫 之後，便無法再檢查此訊息，或針對此訊息呼叫 。After you call , you can no longer inspect the message or call on the message. 如果要求訊息大於要使用之繫結所允許的訊息大小上限，則會擲回 。If the request message is larger that the maximum message size allowed by the binding being used, a is thrown. 訊息大小上限是由 屬性所設定。The maximum message size is set by the property. 預設值為 65536 個位元組。The default value is 65536 bytes. 如果在呼叫此函式時傳遞 `timeout`，則會使用該值。If a `timeout` is passed while calling the function then that value is used. 如果在繫結上設定 ，則如果在呼叫此函式時未指定任何 `timeout`，便會使用繫結上的值。If the is set on the binding, then the value on the binding is used if no `timeout` is specified while calling the function. 如果在繫結上或是呼叫此函式時，未指定任何逾時值，則會使用 。The is used if no timeout is specified on either the binding or while calling the function. 這個預設值為 1 分鐘。This default value is 1 minute. ## Examples 下列程式碼會示範如何實作這個方法。The following code shows how to implement this method. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果沒有指定 ， 會同時當做最終目的端和實體位址。The serves as both the ultimate destination and the physical address if a is not specified. 如果指定了 ，這就是訊息傳送的實際實體目標位址，而且訊息必須透過這個位址，才能到達目的端。If the is specified, then that is the actual physical address to which the message is sent and through which the message must go to arrive at its destination. ## Examples 下列程式碼會示範如何實作這個屬性。The following code shows how to implement this property.
